document.full_text: libya's deputy foreign minister said on friday muammar gaddafi's army may quit fighting in misrata because of nato airstrikes and allow local tribes to lead the fight against rebels.
document.title: libya army may quit misrata fight due to airstrikes
lines_and_colors: libya's deputy foreign minister said on friday muammar gaddafi's army may quit fighting in misrata because of nato airstrikes and allow local tribes to lead the fight against rebels.
